articles.description: Follow live text and BBC 5 live radio commentary from the French Open at Roland-Garros, the second Grand Slam tournament of the year.
articles.title: French Open 2025 LIVE: Alcaraz vs Sinner - score, results & radio from Roland Garros

articles.description: England continue their dominance over West Indies as a four-wicket win in the second T20 at Bristol seals the series with a game to spare.
articles.title: England vs West Indies: Jos Buttler top-scores in chase of 197 to win second T20 at Bristol and seal series victory

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Germany vs France in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: Germany vs France: UEFA Nations League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: In his own press conference, Luciano Spalletti reveals he has been sacked as Italy's head coach after his side lost 3-0 to Norway in a World Cup qualifier on Friday. But he will still take charge of their game against Moldova on Monday.
articles.title: Luciano Spalletti: Italy boss reveals his own sacking during press conference

articles.description: Borussia Dortmund agree a deal with Sunderland to sign Jobe Bellingham for an initial 32m euros (£26.96m) plus 5m euros (£4.2m) in add-ons.
articles.title: Jobe Bellingham: Borussia Dortmund agree £31m deal to sign Sunderland midfielder

articles.description: Former Tottenham manager Mauricio Pochettino says a return to the club to replace Ange Postecoglou is "not realistic".
articles.title: Tottenham: Mauricio Pochettino rules himself out of running to replace Ange Postecoglou

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says his side "got away with it" in their 1-0 win against Andorra in a performance that "wasn't good enough".
articles.title: England got away with it against Andorra - Harry Kane

articles.description: Scotland have called up free agent Ross Doohan and Bournemouth 18-year-old Callan McKenna after facing a goalkeeping crisis for Monday's friendly in Liechtenstein.
articles.title: Scotland call up Doohan and McKenna after goalkeeper SOS

articles.description: After holding the title for 52 years, Olga Morozova's reign as Queen's women's singles champion is about to come to an end.
articles.title: Queen's 2025: Olga Morozova - women's singles champion since 1973

articles.description: Tottenham sack head coach Robert Vilahamn after two years in charge, after the club finished second-bottom in the Women's Super League.
articles.title: Tottenham Hotspur: Head coach Robert Vilahamn sacked by WSL club
